reviews.review: It was a fun puzzle game with cool hidden detail and funny humor. Great atmosphere and great gameplay.
not gonna lie, the portal jumping effect makes my head hurt.
I wish it was longer, but it's still pretty good. Wish I got cake though.
Jogo MUITO BOM!Recomendo d+, ainda mais com o pre√ßo acess√≠vel de apenas 6 reais nessa promo√ß√£o com o jogo 1 e 2. muito bom.

an absolute masterclass in atmosphere and environmental storytelling. it's not as long as many other games, or even it's sequel, but it uses the time it has very well. everything from the level design to the dialogue and music and ambience is perfectly crafted to convey the loneliness and dread of being trapped in a long-abandoned science facility with no one but a glitchy AI and a bunch of murderous turrets, while also having some humor to lighten the mood and keep things from feeling too hopeless.

overall, a very good game. probably one of the best. play it.
This mechanic is just so good, also the way for implementing it, the last song is a masterpiece. In summary a really good game

Un clasico con una mecanica sencilla pero innovadora en su momento. Lo vale.
a real classic. look up the Psychological Instability map pack by Jack5 for a challenge, I really liked that one.
This game is not dated. I recomend it

Very innovative and creative levels. Game design makes you feel like a genius after finishing.

Es bastante sencillo de pasar realmente pero la experiencia de juego es muy buena, la voz que nos va guiando por todo el camino y los puzzles que pueden llegar a ser confusos nos generan un verdadero reto o por lo contrario hacernos pensar, este juego cuando ha salido?, dejando de lado todo eso, es un excelente titulo que sin duda debes de jugar

The cake is a lie! - This game is Super fun and I'm now playing Portal 2 which is awesome as well. Also - please save the companion cube <3, it is well worth finishing the game with a clear conscience - how do you do it??? where there is a will... there is a way.

" When the test course is over, you will be missed. " 

Portal √© um jogo din√¢mico que mistura um divertido percurso labir√≠ntico e um enredo envolvente que aos poucos se revela. Seu humor sarc√°stico √© representado principalmente pela principal personagem com quem interagimos, a infame e companheira IA GLaDOS, que rouba a cena com seus coment√°rios habilidosamente tecidos. Ao longo da curta (a depender das sacadas do jogador diante dos puzzles) jornada, a hist√≥ria criada em segundo plano toma conta dos momentos da jogatina, criando brechas para que conhe√ßamos o universo interessantemente proposto, fazendo parte, inclusive, de uma longa teia relacionada √† sua sequ√™ncia, jogos "primos" (como o famigerado Half Life) e HQ's, sem falar nos desafios que, como conte√∫do extra, mobilizam os mais corajosos e estendem a experi√™ncia. Como um excelente passatempo e uma grande fomenta √† imagina√ß√£o, criatividade e curiosidade, Portal √© um fen√¥meno que vale a pena conferir e apreciar.

I wasn't really interested in Portal since I don't really play puzzle games. But huge Steam sale convinced me and I don't regret it! This is more than just a fun puzzle game with portal-mechanics. It has interesting lore behind it. If only it was longer than 2.5 hrs. Well...on to the next one!

11/10 must buy, especially in sale

PS: First game where I didn't skip ending credits. So cool.
PPS: Remember: Cake is a LIE!

I don't have much to say other than this game is a classic game everyone should attempt to play at some point. Fantastic music and thought provoking puzzles (more-so in the sequel). I hope there is more to come one day.

This was a triumph.
I'm making a note here: HUGE SUCCESS.
It's hard to overstate my satisfaction.
Aperture Science
We do what we must
because we can.
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.
But there's no sense crying over every mistake.
You just keep on trying till you run out of cake.
And the Science gets done.
And you make a neat gun.
For the people who are still alive.
I'm not even angry.
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though you broke my heart.
And killed me.
And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because I was so happy for you!
Now these points of data make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
We're releasing on time.
So I'm GLaD. I got burned.
Think of all the things we learned
for the people who are still alive.
Go ahead and leave me.
I think I prefer to stay inside.
Maybe you'll find someone else to help you.
Maybe Black Mesa
THAT WAS A JOKE.
HAHA. FAT CHANCE.
Anyway, this cake is great.
It's so delicious and moist.
Look at me still talking
when there's Science to do.
When I look out there, it makes me GLaD I'm not you.
I've experiments to run.
There is research to be done.
On the people who are still alive.
And believe me I am still alive.
I'm doing Science and I'm still alive.
I feel FANTASTIC and I'm still alive.
While you're dying I'll be still alive.
And when you're dead I will be still alive.
STILL ALIVE
I liked it, really cool, lot of achievements, completed them all in 3 hours! Amazing stuff.
amazing game but buy it on sale its like 2 bucks
